metadata.feature_description: Search posts by keywords, tags, and authors with advanced filtering options

steps.action: Navigate to Publisher page with keyword search parameter (text=technology)
steps.expected: Search should return posts containing the keyword 'technology'
steps.actual: Search returned 2 posts: 'First Test Post About Technology' and 'Tech News and Innovation', both containing the keyword 'technology'

steps.action: Navigate to Publisher page with single tag filter (tags=sports)
steps.expected: Filter should return posts tagged with 'sports'
steps.actual: Filter returned 1 post: 'Sports News Update' which has the 'sports' tag

steps.action: Navigate to Publisher page with multiple tag filter (tags=technology,news)
steps.expected: Filter should return posts that have ALL specified tags (AND logic)
steps.actual: Filter returned 1 post: 'Tech News and Innovation' which has both 'technology' AND 'news' tags. Code confirms AND logic is used (all tags must match)

steps.action: Navigate to base Publisher URL without any filter parameters
steps.expected: All posts should be displayed without any filters applied
steps.actual: All 9 posts are displayed including test posts and other existing posts. Tags filter shows all available tags, Authors filter shows SuperUser Account (9)

steps.expected: Empty search results message should be displayed
steps.actual: Page displays 'Your search returned no results.' message with clear formatting

steps.action: Search with special characters in query (text=&<>"test")
steps.expected: System should handle special characters properly and return matching posts
steps.actual: System properly URL-encoded special characters (%26%3C%3E%22test%22) and returned 7 posts containing 'test' in their title. Search box displays the decoded special characters correctly

observations: Filter by date range: Code review shows no date range filtering UI is implemented in the Search.ascx component or SearchManager.js. The QueryDto in List.ascx.cs does not include date range parameters.

Filter by author: Author filtering is available via URL parameter (author=userId) and works via the Authors sidebar filter, but was not explicitly tested as a separate scenario since it uses the same mechanism as tag filtering.
Search result pagination: The CardViewManager.js implements infinite scroll pagination. Testing would require more than PageSize (default) posts to trigger pagination.
Search result sorting: No explicit sorting controls are visible in the UI. Results appear to be sorted by date (newest first) by default based on code review.
The Search component (Search.ascx.cs) only displays when ViewMode is List and posts exist (NoPosts check).
Multiple tag filtering uses AND logic - posts must have ALL selected tags to appear in results, confirmed in PostManager.SearchPosts method.
FilterManager.cs implements caching for tags and authors using CBO.GetCachedObject with a 1-minute cache duration.
